Introduction

A.iRiD was a South Korean girl group signed with ONO Entertainment. The group name is short for “iridescent”. On August 30, 2022, ONO Entertainment unveiled coming soon teasers for the group’s pre-debut single, “First Flight”. This was eventually released on September 1, 2022. The group was set to debut in October 2022 but was later pushed back to 2023. They again released a pre-debut single “Super Freaky Girls” on December 21, 2022. They presumably disbanded in March 2023 due to inactivity on their SNS.
